entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as a person who was sold to Voldemort by Pettigrew. ("You sold Lily and James to Voldemort")

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as a person who was sold to Voldemort by Pettigrew. ("You sold Lily and James to Voldemort")

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the Dark Lord who forced Pettigrew to pass information to him. ("He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named forced me")

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is mentioned as a person who was accused of being Voldemort's spy and passing information to him. ("YOU'D BEEN PASSING INFORMATION TO HIM FOR A YEAR BEFORE LILY AND JAMES DIED! YOU WERE HIS SPY!")

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is mentioned as a person who was present during the conversation and accused Pettigrew of being Voldemort's spy. ("YOU'D BEEN PASSING INFORMATION TO HIM FOR A YEAR BEFORE LILY AND JAMES DIED! YOU WERE HIS SPY!")

entities.name: remus
entities.description: Remus is mentioned as a person who was brave like Sirius and James. ("I never meant it to happen. … He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named forced me —")

relationships.description: Pettigrew was accused of being Voldemort's spy and passing information to him. ("YOU'D BEEN PASSING INFORMATION TO HIM FOR A YEAR BEFORE LILY AND JAMES DIED! YOU WERE HIS SPY!")
Voldemort forced Pettigrew to pass information to him. ("He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named forced me —")
